mapper.insert:
insert into code_draw_ref_vip
ref_id,
code,
draw_digit,
#{refId,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{code,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{drawDigit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update code_draw_ref_vip
code = #{code,jdbcType=BIGINT},
draw_digit = #{drawDigit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ref_id = #{refId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT draw_digit FROM code_draw_ref_vip where code <= #{code,jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY code desc limit 1

select
from code_draw_ref_vip ORDER BY CASE WHEN draw_digit = '个位' THEN '1' WHEN draw_digit = '十位' THEN '2' WHEN draw_digit = '百位' THEN '3' WHEN draw_digit = '千位' THEN '4' WHEN draw_digit = '万位' THEN '5' WHEN draw_digit = '十万位' THEN '6' WHEN draw_digit = '百万位' THEN '7' ELSE draw_digit END ASC
